plot: A young man who has lost his heart, his love, and his life attempts to buy it back. On the verge of attainment he finds he is a character in a story, written by himself.
title: Something Out of Nothing
plot_es: A young man who has lost his heart, his love, and his life attempts to buy it back. On the verge of attainment he finds he is a character in a story, written by himself.
plot_en: A young man who has lost his heart, his love, and his life attempts to buy it back. On the verge of attainment he finds he is a character in a story, written by himself.
